EmailTemplate.subject: Controlling Storage from VM to Spindle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Achieving VM-to-Spindle Storage Control {{lead.First Name:default=FACT}}:
Approximately 25% of virtualization dollars are dedicated to storage, with much of this spend wasted on over-provisioned IO and disk capacity. By effectively controlling the end-to-end relationships between workloads and storage, organizations can:
- Reduce ongoing storage costs by 20-30% - Reliably virtualize IO-intensive applications - Actively prevent complex storage problems - Intelligently thin-provision, deduplicate, and compress storage volumes to optimize datastore efficiency
VMTurbo’s Aligning Virtualization & Storage Management <http://bit.ly/1mL9ddp> whitepaper explores the most common storage performance issues, and how your organization can leverage Storage Magazine's 2013 Product of the Year <http://bit.ly/1jCKrtQ>, to own your environment from VM to spindle.
It’s a new era in storage management.
